system.shortDescription:
This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.yuftnxwtc9du93ho]{Hex Glyph}, except you can store a hex or a major hex (but not a grand hex). You trace the glyph with incense, which must first be sprinkled with powdered diamond (as noted in the material line).

@Compendium[pf1.spells.j0bc0iii8zp1jiwr]{Read Magic} allows its caster to identify a greater hex glyph with a DC 16 @UUID[Compendium.pf1.pf1e-rules.x175kVqUfLGPt8tC.JournalEntryPage.VRD7jxiIAxKPt6EF]{Spellcraft} check.
